mapper.select: SELECT tid, title, tpname, pics FROM travels t JOIN travelstype ty ON t.tpid = ty.tpid WHERE t.tpid = #{id} ORDER BY t.viewcount DESC LIMIT 0,6
SELECT tid,title, content,date,viewcount,pics,place, tpid, uid FROM travels WHERE uid = #{uid}
SELECT tid,title, content,date,viewcount,pics,place, tpid, uid FROM travels WHERE tpid = #{tpid}
SELECT t.tid, t.tpid, t.title, t.content, t.date, t.viewcount, t.pics FROM user u JOIN collection c ON u.uid=c.uid JOIN travels t ON t.tid=c.tid WHERE u.uid=#{uid}
